STATE v. PERDOMO No. COA06-651 Court of Appeals of North Carolina Filed April 17, 2007 Certification Date May 7, 2007 Appeal from Wake (02CRS14253, 02CRS14256, 02CRS14257, 02CRS14263).

Cases reported without published opinion. Certiorari denied, affirmed in part, reversed and remanded in part.
